Sets or gets the paused state of the game for all players.

== Syntax ==

* <code>globalpause <''isPaused: bool''></code>

== Arguments ==

* ''isPaused: bool''
** Specifies the value to pause the world, must in between <code>true</code> or <code>false</code>.
